Fabulous Furs is a luxury fur brand renowned for its exquisite craftsmanship and luxurious materials. From classic mink coats to contemporary fox vests, Fabulous Furs offers a wide selection of timeless pieces that will elevate any wardrobe.

Contribute to A Legacy of Compassionate Fashion In 1989, Donna Salyers founded Fabulous Furs, a brand that seamlessly blends opulence with ethical consciousness. From stunning faux fur coats to stylish accessories, Fabulous Furs offers a range of cruelty-free alternatives that redefine luxury.

Our brand began with a passion for animals, needle, thread, and the belief that cruelty-free fashion could be achieved. Over 30 years ago, after sewing a luxurious faux fur coat for herself, Donna Salyers designed a sewing kit so others could do the same. Success followed passion and excellence, and Donna ushered in an exciting new era for the faux fur industry. At Donna Salyers Fabulous...
